tag t1, site s1, question q1, answer a1, tag_question tq1, so_user u1,
account

account.id = u1.account_id;

account.website_url != '' and
account.id = so_user.account_id and

b1.site_id = so_user.site_id and
b1.user_id = so_user.id and
b1.name = 'Nice Question' and

b2.site_id = so_user.site_id and
b2.user_id = so_user.id and
b2.name = 'Nice Question' and
b2.date > b1.date + '9 months'::interval;
best_hints:
SeqScan(so_user)
SeqScan(account)
SeqScan(b2)
SeqScan(b1)
HashJoin(so_user account)
HashJoin(b2 so_user account)
HashJoin(b1 b2 so_user account)
Leading((b1(b2(so_user account))))
all_hints:
SeqScan(so_user)
SeqScan(account)
SeqScan(b2)
SeqScan(b1)
HashJoin(so_user account)
HashJoin(b2 so_user account)
HashJoin(b1 b2 so_user account)
Leading((b1(b2(so_user account))))

sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM
tag as t,
site as s,
question as q,
tag_question as tq
WHERE
t.site_id = s.site_id
AND q.site_id = s.site_id
AND tq.site_id = s.site_id
AND tq.question_id = q.id
AND tq.tag_id = t.id
AND (s.site_name in ('physics'))
AND (t.name in ('astronomy','astrophysics','electricity','electrons','everyday-life','inertial-frames','nuclear-physics','orbital-motion','potential','schroedinger-equation','space-expansion','standard-model','supersymmetry','terminology'))
AND (q.score >= 1)
AND (q.score <= 10);

SELECT t1.name, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
question as q1,
answer as a1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1
WHERE
q1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND a1.question_id = q1.id
AND a1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND s.site_id = q1.site_id
AND s.site_id = a1.site_id
AND s.site_id = u1.site_id
AND s.site_id = tq1.site_id
AND s.site_id = t1.site_id
AND q1.id = tq1.question_id
AND t1.id = tq1.tag_id
AND (s.site_name in ('askubuntu','math'))
AND (t1.name in ('abstract-algebra','algebraic-geometry','probability-distributions','quadratics'))
AND (q1.view_count >= 0)
AND (q1.view_count <= 100)
AND (u1.upvotes >= 1)
AND (u1.upvotes <= 100)
GROUP BY t1.name;

sql:
SELECT t1.name, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
question as q1,
answer as a1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1
WHERE
q1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND a1.question_id = q1.id
AND a1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND s.site_id = q1.site_id
AND s.site_id = a1.site_id
AND s.site_id = u1.site_id
AND s.site_id = tq1.site_id
AND s.site_id = t1.site_id
AND q1.id = tq1.question_id
AND t1.id = tq1.tag_id
AND (s.site_name in ('askubuntu','math'))
AND (t1.name in ('dpkg','dynamical-systems','linear-algebra','linear-transformations','nvidia','set-theory','wine'))
AND (q1.score >= 0)
AND (q1.score <= 5)
AND (u1.downvotes >= 10)
AND (u1.downvotes <= 100000)
GROUP BY t1.name;

sql:
select COUNT(distinct account.display_name)
from
tag t1, site s1, question q1, answer a1, tag_question tq1, so_user u1,
tag t2, site s2, question q2, tag_question tq2, so_user u2,
account
where

s1.site_name='stackoverflow' and
t1.name  = 'foreach' and
t1.site_id = s1.site_id and
q1.site_id = s1.site_id and
tq1.site_id = s1.site_id and
tq1.question_id = q1.id and
tq1.tag_id = t1.id and
a1.site_id = q1.site_id and
a1.question_id = q1.id and
a1.owner_user_id = u1.id and
a1.site_id = u1.site_id and


s2.site_name='stats' and
t2.name  = 'regression' and
t2.site_id = s2.site_id and
q2.site_id = s2.site_id and
tq2.site_id = s2.site_id and
tq2.question_id = q2.id and
tq2.tag_id = t2.id and
q2.owner_user_id = u2.id and
q2.site_id = u2.site_id and



u1.account_id = u2.account_id and
account.id = u1.account_id;

sql:
SELECT acc.location, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
question as q1,
answer as a1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1,
badge as b,
account as acc
WHERE
s.site_id = q1.site_id
AND s.site_id = u1.site_id
AND s.site_id = a1.site_id
AND s.site_id = t1.site_id
AND s.site_id = tq1.site_id
AND s.site_id = b.site_id
AND q1.id = tq1.question_id
AND q1.id = a1.question_id
AND a1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND t1.id = tq1.tag_id
AND b.user_id = u1.id
AND acc.id = u1.account_id
AND (s.site_name in ('superuser'))
AND (t1.name in ('command-line','partitioning'))
AND (q1.view_count >= 0)
AND (q1.view_count <= 100)
AND (u1.downvotes >= 0)
AND (u1.downvotes <= 1)
AND (b.name in ('Commentator','Editor','Nice Answer','Notable Question','Tumbleweed','Yearling'))
GROUP BY acc.location
ORDER BY COUNT(*)
DESC
LIMIT 100;

sql:
SELECT acc.location, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
question as q1,
answer as a1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1,
badge as b,
account as acc
WHERE
s.site_id = q1.site_id
AND s.site_id = u1.site_id
AND s.site_id = a1.site_id
AND s.site_id = t1.site_id
AND s.site_id = tq1.site_id
AND s.site_id = b.site_id
AND q1.id = tq1.question_id
AND q1.id = a1.question_id
AND a1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND t1.id = tq1.tag_id
AND b.user_id = u1.id
AND acc.id = u1.account_id
AND (s.site_name in ('diy','sharepoint','webapps'))
AND (t1.name in ('2010','2013','electrical','google-sheets','sharepoint-online','sharepoint-server'))
AND (q1.score >= 0)
AND (q1.score <= 0)
AND (u1.reputation >= 0)
AND (u1.reputation <= 10)
AND (b.name in ('Custodian','Notable Question','Scholar','Teacher','Tumbleweed'))
GROUP BY acc.location
ORDER BY COUNT(*)
DESC
LIMIT 100;

from
tag t1, site s1, question q1, answer a1, tag_question tq1, so_user u1,
tag t2, site s2, question q2, tag_question tq2, so_user u2,
account
where

s1.site_name='stackoverflow' and
t1.name  = 'amazon-s3' and
t1.site_id = s1.site_id and
q1.site_id = s1.site_id and
tq1.site_id = s1.site_id and

tq2.question_id = q2.id and

q2.owner_user_id = u2.id and

u1.account_id = u2.account_id and

sql:
SELECT b1.name, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1,
question as q1,
badge as b1,
account as acc
WHERE
s.site_id = u1.site_id
AND s.site_id = b1.site_id
AND s.site_id = t1.site_id
AND s.site_id = tq1.site_id
AND s.site_id = q1.site_id
AND t1.id = tq1.tag_id
AND q1.id = tq1.question_id
AND q1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND acc.id = u1.account_id
AND b1.user_id = u1.id
AND (q1.view_count >= 10)
AND (q1.view_count <= 1000)
AND (s.site_name in ('rpg'))
AND (t1.name in ('attack','balance','character-creation','damage','dnd-3.5e','dnd-4e','fate','feats','gm-techniques','monsters','multi-classing','wizard','world-of-darkness'))
AND (acc.website_url ILIKE ('%com'))
GROUP BY b1.name
ORDER BY COUNT(*)
DESC
LIMIT 100;

sql:
SELECT b1.name, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1,
question as q1,
badge as b1,
account as acc
WHERE
s.site_id = u1.site_id
AND s.site_id = b1.site_id
AND s.site_id = t1.site_id
AND s.site_id = tq1.site_id
AND s.site_id = q1.site_id
AND t1.id = tq1.tag_id
AND q1.id = tq1.question_id
AND q1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND acc.id = u1.account_id
AND b1.user_id = u1.id
AND (q1.favorite_count >= 0)
AND (q1.favorite_count <= 1)
AND (s.site_name in ('ell','gamedev','gaming','judaism','sharepoint'))
AND (t1.name in ('2010','android','collision-detection','list','meaning','word-meaning'))
AND (acc.website_url ILIKE ('%'))
GROUP BY b1.name
ORDER BY COUNT(*)
DESC
LIMIT 100;

sql:
SELECT acc.location, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
question as q1,
answer as a1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1,
badge as b,
account as acc
WHERE
s.site_id = q1.site_id
AND s.site_id = u1.site_id
AND s.site_id = a1.site_id
AND s.site_id = t1.site_id
AND s.site_id = tq1.site_id
AND s.site_id = b.site_id
AND q1.id = tq1.question_id
AND q1.id = a1.question_id
AND a1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND t1.id = tq1.tag_id
AND b.user_id = u1.id
AND acc.id = u1.account_id
AND (s.site_name in ('stackoverflow'))
AND (t1.name in ('javabeans','kendo-grid','mathematical-optimization','transform'))
AND (q1.favorite_count >= 0)
AND (q1.favorite_count <= 10000)
AND (u1.downvotes >= 10)
AND (u1.downvotes <= 100000)
AND (b.name in ('Popular Question','Tumbleweed'))
GROUP BY acc.location
ORDER BY COUNT(*)
DESC
LIMIT 100;

sql:
SELECT acc.location, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
question as q1,
answer as a1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1,
badge as b,
account as acc
WHERE
s.site_id = q1.site_id
AND s.site_id = u1.site_id
AND s.site_id = a1.site_id
AND s.site_id = t1.site_id
AND s.site_id = tq1.site_id
AND s.site_id = b.site_id
AND q1.id = tq1.question_id
AND q1.id = a1.question_id
AND a1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND t1.id = tq1.tag_id
AND b.user_id = u1.id
AND acc.id = u1.account_id
AND (s.site_name in ('askubuntu','math'))
AND (t1.name in ('18.04','apache2','compactness','partitioning','physics','wine'))
AND (q1.view_count >= 100)
AND (q1.view_count <= 100000)
AND (u1.downvotes >= 0)
AND (u1.downvotes <= 1)
AND (b.name in ('Civic Duty','Guru','Organizer','Peer Pressure','Self-Learner','Talkative'))
GROUP BY acc.location
ORDER BY COUNT(*)
DESC
LIMIT 100;

sql:
SELECT acc.location, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
question as q1,
answer as a1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1,
badge as b,
account as acc
WHERE
s.site_id = q1.site_id
AND s.site_id = u1.site_id
AND s.site_id = a1.site_id
AND s.site_id = t1.site_id
AND s.site_id = tq1.site_id
AND s.site_id = b.site_id
AND q1.id = tq1.question_id
AND q1.id = a1.question_id
AND a1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND t1.id = tq1.tag_id
AND b.user_id = u1.id
AND acc.id = u1.account_id
AND (s.site_name in ('webmasters'))
AND (t1.name in ('domains','google-search','redirects'))
AND (q1.view_count >= 100)
AND (q1.view_count <= 100000)
AND (u1.reputation >= 0)
AND (u1.reputation <= 10)
AND (b.name in ('Autobiographer','Student'))
GROUP BY acc.location
ORDER BY COUNT(*)
DESC
LIMIT 100;

sql:
SELECT b1.name, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1,
question as q1,
badge as b1,
account as acc
WHERE
s.site_id = u1.site_id
AND s.site_id = b1.site_id
AND s.site_id = t1.site_id
AND s.site_id = tq1.site_id
AND s.site_id = q1.site_id
AND t1.id = tq1.tag_id
AND q1.id = tq1.question_id
AND q1.owner_user_id = u1.id
AND acc.id = u1.account_id
AND b1.user_id = u1.id
AND (q1.view_count >= 0)
AND (q1.view_count <= 100)
AND (s.site_name in ('cs','gamedev','webapps'))
AND (t1.name in ('algorithms','asymptotics','automata','complexity-theory','facebook','formulas','google-sheets-query','graph-theory','java','optimization','regular-languages','time-complexity'))
AND (acc.website_url ILIKE ('%en'))
GROUP BY b1.name
ORDER BY COUNT(*)
DESC
LIMIT 100;

sql:
SELECT acc.location, count(*)
FROM
site as s,
so_user as u1,
question as q1,
answer as a1,
tag as t1,
tag_question as tq1,
